casebody.data:
STATE EX. REL. Theodore SMITH
v.
STATE of Louisiana NO. 2017-KH-0833 Supreme Court of Louisiana. August 31, 2018 Denied. Relator has previously exhausted his right to state collateral review. See State ex rel. Smith v. State, 15-0018 (La. 10/30/15), 178 So.3d 131 . WEIMER, J., recused.
